property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. As an additional cost to rez non-ice cards, the Corp must randomly trash a card from HQ.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Off-Campus Apartment can host any number of connections. Whenever you install a connection on Off-Campus Apartment, draw 1 card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Usually crashing with friends means sleeping on the couch. This time, it meant sleeping on a server farm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install a resource from your grip, lowering the install cost by 3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can help Jinteki shape the future. Your future."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 4 power counters on Dorm Computer when you install it. [Click], hosted power counter: Make a run. Avoid all tags for the remainder of the run.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Universal Scholar

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time you install a card each turn, you may install another card of the same type from your grip (paying its install cost).

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [Click]. If you have fewer cards in your grip than your maximum hand size, draw cards until you have cards in your grip equal to your maximum hand size.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1[Memory Unit] The first time you play an event each turn, you may play another event (without spending a click) after the first one resolves. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Study Guide has +1 strength for each power counter on it. 1[Credits]: Break code gate subroutine. 2[Credits]: Place 1 power counter on Study Guide.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once you download the lecture source files, this program does a statistical analysis and distills the most important concepts." -Hayley Kaplan

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 1[Credits]: Break code gate subroutine.||2[Credits]: Place 1 power counter on Study Guide.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trash all programs hosted on London Library when your turn ends. [Click]: Install a non-virus program from your grip on London Library, ignoring the install cost. [Click]: Add a program on London Library to your grip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click], [Click]: Search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are whole generations of people who never move out of a megalopolis center. You should see the look on their face the first time they see the stars." -Professor Darren Fin, Astronomy

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, lose [Click]. Your maximum hand size is increased by 5.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So much to do. So little time."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Research Grant, you may score another copy of Research Grant that is installed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My research could make your corporation billions. And save lives, of course."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Turing has +3 strength while protecting a remote server. The Runner cannot use AI programs to break subroutines on Turing. [Subroutine] End the run unless the Runner spends [Click][Click][Click].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Alan Turing laid the foundation for artificial intelligence by suggesting that you could teach a computer to be human.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crick has +3 strength while protecting Archives. [Subroutine] Install a card from Archives (paying its install cost).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crick and his colleagues ushered in modern genetics by mapping the structure of DNA.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search R&D for up to X different sysops (by title), reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My script can perform the Kobayashi algorithm in .12 seconds."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cards cannot leave the Runner's heap for any reason.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Officially, there is no blacklist. That would be illegal. Unofficially, there is a list, and being on it can ruin a career.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gutenberg has +3 strength while protecting R&D. [Subroutine] Trace7– If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Johannes Gutenberg ignited the first Information Revolution by inventing the movable-type printing press.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play an event that there is a copy of in his or her heap, the Runner must pay 2[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cost of an education is sometimes felt sharpest in the stomach.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Meru Mati has +3 strength while protecting HQ. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Meru Mati pushed the limits of physics by engineering the first buckyweave structure, a thousand-foot long wall.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: The rez cost of cards in this server is lowered by 5. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Big One, real estate value changed sharply. Some found that they had become owners of beachfront property. Others were underwater.
